original_text: “Speak to Aaron and say to him, When you set up the lamps, the seven lamps shall give light in front of the lampstand.”
korean_text: 아론에게 말하여 이르라 등불을 켤 때에는 일곱 등잔을 등잔대 앞으로 비추게 할지니라 하시매

sentences.original_text: Speak to Aaron and say to him
When you set up the lamps
the seven lamps shall give light in front of the lampstand
sentences.korean_translation: 일곱 등불은 등대 앞을 비추게 되리라
